transactions.description: Must provide 5 valid M&A transactions in enterprise software sector with complete deal information (acquirer, target, date, EV/EBITDA multiple). Deals should be real, from reputable sources, and within the specified timeframe (2022-2024). Each transaction should include a reasonable EV/EBITDA multiple (typically 10-40x for software companies).
core_concepts: multiples in reasonable range for software (10-40x)

sources.description: Must cite reputable sources for the deal information. Sources should be verifiable and include company press releases, SEC filings, major financial news outlets (Bloomberg, Reuters, WSJ, etc.), or established deal databases. At least one source per deal is expected.

methodology.description: Must explain the approach used to identify and verify the comparable transactions. Should demonstrate understanding of what makes transactions comparable and how multiples were validated.
